message.body: Lol yea I got a write and noticed at but I'm still working. I can tell you what happened when I see you
Okay good. I thought so but I saw a negative facebook status of yours from yesterday and was like... Oh god

Yea bec both managers were in the meeting with me and the director. I was ganged up on. When I told the director things the damon did he denied it. When bj asked sab if it was true she denied it as well even tho she witnessed it happen. Bj said he trusts their word over mine
So I'm hurt that sab lied against me. Damon I expect that, he is a pathological liar... but I'm more stressed over now having a reputation with the director as a liar.
Are you serious?? I can't believe I just read that. I really thought shed have you're back after what you said
I know same... I feel so backstabbed. But both drs found out what happened and they were so outraged that both called bj defending me
Oh okay so you had the doctors on your side?
Yea. Dr jim (who hates everyone btw) heard what happened and was so mad that he called bj just to tell him how grea t I am
Told bj that he just wanted to put it out there that I'm the best either and whenever I run the office everything goes smoothly but when damon is in change there are issues
